page.title: 04Cullyhanna School Activity.
page.content: The boys in our school play football. For this, they wear navy jumpers trimmed with white and shorts.The girls play netball and they are supplied with matching blouses and wrap-a-round skirts.Both teams compete against other schools in the area,and league matches are also held within the school.This year, our school took part in the newly formed Inter Primary Schools' Drama Festival.Our play, "Spreading the News,"by Lady Gregory, won the Adjudicator's Special Award for Production. Following the success of this, we staged an "End of Term" fund raising concert in the nearby Newtownhamilton hall.For this, each class in the school participated. We also entered for essay and poetry writing competitions and won many prizes. We won the Beattie Cup for spoken Irish for 2 successive years.
